// ==UserScript==
// @name TorrentProject
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @connect *://torrentproject.se/*
// @trackerURL http://torrentproject.se/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "TorrentProject",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "",
  "downloadUrl": "",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "http://torrentproject.se/?s=%search%",
    "baseUrl": "http://torrentproject.se/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "#ires>ol>li",
    "torrentSelector": {
      "categoryTitle": "div>div:eq(0)>span.bc.cate:eq(0)",
      "title": "div>h3>a",
      "url": {
        "selector": "div>h3>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": "div>div:eq(0)>span.bc.torrent-size:eq(0)",
      "seed": "div>div:eq(0)>span:eq(0)>span",
      "peer": "div>div:eq(0)>span.bc.leechers:eq(0)>span"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 1789587214
};

API_exKit(code);
